thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Experience
thread.title_full: Amazing Experience - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ESRA O
title: Amazing Experience
text:
I can wholeheartedly say that this hotel is the top pick of my entire travel history. Amazing view, large rooms (especially in Paris rooms are normally so small) and wonderful location. I was lucky to have such a nice room (no 307, strongly recommended) facing the arch de triumph and fully equipped with everything you might need on a trip.
Room Tip: room 307 was amazing See more room tips
